articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: But the strong winds that fanned the flames were expected to pick up again today, worsening conditions.
articles.title: Los Angeles firefighters see progress in containing blazes

articles.author: Hyunjoo Jin, Jack Kim
articles.description: The flight data and cockpit voice recorders on the Jeju Air jet that crashed on Dec. 29 stopped recording about four minutes before the airliner hit a concrete structure at South Korea's Muan airport, the transport ministry said on Saturday.
articles.title: Jeju Air 'black box' data missing from last 4 minutes before crash, South Korea ministry says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The measures constituted the broadest U.S. package of sanctions so far targeting Russia's oil and gas revenues.
articles.title: Russia says it will continue oil and gas projects despite US sanctions

articles.author: Max Hunder
articles.description: It is the first time Ukraine has announced the capture of North Korean soldiers alive since their entry into the war.
articles.title: Ukraine captures two North Korean soldiers in Kursk, Zelenskiy says

articles.author: Tala Ramadan
articles.description: Lebanon and Syria will work together to secure their land borders, as well as to delineate both land and sea borders, Lebanon's caretaker Prime Minister Najib Mikati said on Saturday in Damascus.
articles.title: Lebanon to work with Syria to strengthen borders

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's Middle East envoy Steve Witkoff will meet Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Saturday, an Israeli official said, amid efforts to secure a hostage deal and ceasefire in Gaza.
articles.title: Trump's Mideast envoy to meet Netanyahu on Saturday, Israeli official says

articles.author: Joe Brock, Chad Terhune
articles.description: As Los Angeles construction worker Ivan De La Torre surveyed a landscape of smoking wreckage in fire-ravaged Altadena, a question nagged at him: how would insurance companies cover the cost of rebuilding an entire neighborhood?
articles.title: Los Angeles wildfires spark insurance anxiety among victims

articles.author: John Irish
articles.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's incoming Ukraine envoy Keith Kellogg was in Paris on Saturday, attending an event at Paris-based Iranian opposition group National Council of Resistance of Iran (NCRI), according to TV footage carried by the group.
articles.title: Trump's Ukraine envoy Kellogg attends Iran opposition event in Paris

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The German military will establish a new division tasked exclusively with territorial defence, the army said on Saturday, bringing all existing reserve units under direct army command.
articles.title: Germany sets up military division dedicated to territorial defence

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Sudan's army said on Saturday it had entered the central city of Wad Madani and was pushing out its paramilitary rivals the Rapid Support Forces (RSF), a step which if completed successfully would be its biggest gain in near two years of war.
articles.title: Sudanese army advances to retake city of Wad Madani from RSF
